con:configuration.scriptText:
import groovy.json.JsonSlurper import com.groovy.*
def response = context.testCase.getTestStepByName("Add product").getPropertyValue("response") log.info response
def holder=new JsonSlurper().parseText(response) log.info holder.success
assert holder.success==1
